nodes.text: Stéphane Roux is a French comic book artist who is known mostly for his cover work for Marvel, DC and Semic comics. His Star Wars work includes covers for the Star Wars: Jedi—The Dark Side miniseries, as well as cover and interior art for the Star Wars: Agent of the Empire series, both from Dark Horse Comics.

He is also the illustrator of the Young Reader title Escape from Darth Vader, based on the opening events of Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope and is co-credited for Use the Force! with the company Pilot Studio.
